unnormalised: India’s coastal cruise scene is really picking up, you know? Just heard that Jalesh Cruises is adding another route, Mumbai to Kochi, starting 10/11/2024. Heard from a friend that the maiden voyage is already 80% booked!
normalised: India's coastal cruise scene is really picking up, you know? Just heard that Jalesh Cruises is adding another route, Mumbai to Kochi, starting tenth november two thousand and twenty four. Heard from a friend that the maiden voyage is already eighty percent booked!

unnormalised: Apparently, it's a 3-day, 2-night trip covering about 500 nautical miles. They're calling it the ‘Spice Route Cruise’, catchy, right? The ship, the 'Karnika', leaves from Mumbai at 4 PM and gets into Kochi around 10 AM on the 3rd day. Tickets are starting from Rs. 15,000, which seems reasonable considering what they offer.
normalised: Apparently, it's a three-day, two-night trip covering about five hundred nautical miles. They're calling it the 'Spice Route Cruise', catchy, right? The ship, the 'Karnika', leaves from Mumbai at four P M and gets into Kochi around ten A M on the third day. Tickets are starting from rupees fifteen thousand, which seems reasonable considering what they offer.

unnormalised: The cruise includes all meals, entertainment (Bollywood nights!), and access to the ship's amenities, like the pool and casino. Though, drinks and shore excursions in Kochi are extra, of course. Kochi, btw, offers backwater tours and visits to the Chinese fishing nets, so definitely worth checking out.
normalised: The cruise includes all meals, entertainment (Bollywood nights!), and access to the ship's amenities, like the pool and casino. Though, drinks and shore excursions in Kochi are extra, of course. Kochi, by the way, offers backwater tours and visits to the Chinese fishing nets, so definitely worth checking out.

unnormalised: The Tourism Ministry expects a 25% increase in coastal tourism this year, all thanks to these new cruise options. Makes you wanna ditch that flight, doesn’t it? Wonder if they offer discounts for senior citizens; gotta check for my parents!
normalised: The Tourism Ministry expects a twenty five percent increase in coastal tourism this year, all thanks to these new cruise options. Makes you wanna ditch that flight, doesn't it? Wonder if they offer discounts for senior citizens; gotta check for my parents!
